mapper.sql: f.CallMaterial_ID, f.DocumentNum, f.NeedUseTime, f.SaleOrderNum, f.PlanningWorkOrderNum, f.TaskNum, f.WokNum, f.MakePersonID, f.MakeTime, f.FState, f.PlanningWorkOrderMasterNum, f.Associated_ID, f.FCallTime, f.FCallMan, f.FOutTime, f.FOutMan, f.FInTime, f.FInMan, f.FRecieveTime, f.FRecieveMan, f.FTime1, f.FMan1, f.CallMaterialFL_ID, f.FIsYL

CallMaterial_ID, DocumentNum, NeedUseTime, SaleOrderNum, PlanningWorkOrderNum, TaskNum, WokNum, MakePersonID, MakeTime, FState, PlanningWorkOrderMasterNum, Associated_ID, FCallTime, FCallMan, FOutTime, FOutMan, FInTime, FInMan, FRecieveTime, FRecieveMan, FTime1, FMan1, CallMaterialFL_ID, FIsYL
mapper.update:
update
set CallMaterial_ID = #{CallMaterial_ID}, DocumentNum = #{DocumentNum}, NeedUseTime = #{NeedUseTime}, SaleOrderNum = #{SaleOrderNum}, PlanningWorkOrderNum = #{PlanningWorkOrderNum}, TaskNum = #{TaskNum}, WokNum = #{WokNum}, MakePersonID = #{MakePersonID}, MakeTime = #{MakeTime}, FState = #{FState}, PlanningWorkOrderMasterNum = #{PlanningWorkOrderMasterNum}, Associated_ID = #{Associated_ID}, FCallTime = #{FCallTime}, FCallMan = #{FCallMan}, FOutTime = #{FOutTime}, FOutMan = #{FOutMan}, FInTime = #{FInTime}, FInMan = #{FInMan}, FRecieveTime = #{FRecieveTime}, FRecieveMan = #{FRecieveMan}, FTime1 = #{FTime1}, FMan1 = #{FMan1}, FIsYL=#{FIsYL}, CallMaterialFL_ID = CallMaterialFL_ID where CallMaterialFL_ID = #{CallMaterialFL_ID}
mapper.select: select gy.*, (case when FNUM1=FNUM2 then '否' else '是' end) FIsYLNew from (select *, (select count(*) from MM_CallMaterialDetailsFL where CallMaterialFL_ID=f.CallMaterialFL_ID) FNUM1, (select count(*) from MM_CallMaterialDetailsFL where CallMaterialFL_ID=f.CallMaterialFL_ID and DemandNum <= QuantityCount) FNUM2 from MM_CallMaterialFL f where f.CallMaterialFL_ID = #{CallMaterialFL_ID} ) gy

select * from(select , ass.Cabinet_Type, project.PPROJECT_CODE, project.PPROJECT_NAME, f1.DocumentNum DocumentNumMain,f1.FState FStateMain,(case when f1.FState='仓库出库' then '是' else '否' end) FIsState from f left join MM_CallMaterial f1 on f.CallMaterial_ID=f1.CallMaterial_ID left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly_Detail f2 on f.PlanningWorkOrderNum=f2.Cabinet_No left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly ass on ass.Cabinet_Assembly_ID = f2.Cabinet_Assembly_ID left join DT_PROJECT project on project.PROJECT_ID = ass.PROJECT_ID where 1=1
and ( f.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PlanningWorkOrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
) gy where 1=1
and ( FIsState = #{pd.KEYWORDS1} )
and ( FState = #{pd.FState} )
[fhstart] order by FCallTime desc [fhend]

select * from(select , ass.Cabinet_Type, project.PPROJECT_CODE, project.PPROJECT_NAME, f1.DocumentNum DocumentNumMain,f1.FState FStateMain,(case when f1.FState='仓库出库' then '是' else '否' end) FIsState from f left join MM_CallMaterial f1 on f.CallMaterial_ID=f1.CallMaterial_ID left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly_Detail f2 on f.PlanningWorkOrderNum=f2.Cabinet_No left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly ass on ass.Cabinet_Assembly_ID = f2.Cabinet_Assembly_ID left join DT_PROJECT project on project.PROJECT_ID = ass.PROJECT_ID where 1=1
and ( f.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PlanningWorkOrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
) gy where 1=1
and ( FIsState = #{pd.KEYWORDS1} )
and ( FState = #{pd.FState} )
[fhstart] order by FTime1 desc [fhend]

select * from(select , ass.Cabinet_Type, project.PPROJECT_CODE, project.PPROJECT_NAME, f1.DocumentNum DocumentNumMain,f1.FState FStateMain,(case when f1.FState='仓库出库' then '是' else '否' end) FIsState from f left join MM_CallMaterial f1 on f.CallMaterial_ID=f1.CallMaterial_ID left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly_Detail f2 on f.PlanningWorkOrderNum=f2.Cabinet_No left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly ass on ass.Cabinet_Assembly_ID = f2.Cabinet_Assembly_ID left join DT_PROJECT project on project.PROJECT_ID = ass.PROJECT_ID where 1=1
and ( f.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PlanningWorkOrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
) gy where 1=1
and ( FIsState = #{pd.KEYWORDS1} )
and ( FState = #{pd.FState} )
[fhstart] order by FTime1 desc [fhend]

select * from(select , ass.Cabinet_Type, project.PPROJECT_CODE, project.PPROJECT_NAME, f1.DocumentNum DocumentNumMain,f1.FState FStateMain,(case when f1.FState='仓库出库' then '是' else '否' end) FIsState from f left join MM_CallMaterial f1 on f.CallMaterial_ID=f1.CallMaterial_ID left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly_Detail f2 on f.PlanningWorkOrderNum=f2.Cabinet_No left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly ass on ass.Cabinet_Assembly_ID = f2.Cabinet_Assembly_ID left join DT_PROJECT project on project.PROJECT_ID = ass.PROJECT_ID where 1=1
and ( f.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PlanningWorkOrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
) gy where 1=1
and ( FIsState = #{pd.KEYWORDS1} )
and ( FState = #{pd.FState} )
and FIsYL='否' [fhstart] order by FInTime desc [fhend]

select * from(select , ass.Cabinet_Type, project.PPROJECT_CODE, project.PPROJECT_NAME, f1.DocumentNum DocumentNumMain,f1.FState FStateMain,(case when f1.FState='仓库出库' then '是' else '否' end) FIsState from f left join MM_CallMaterial f1 on f.CallMaterial_ID=f1.CallMaterial_ID left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly_Detail f2 on f.PlanningWorkOrderNum=f2.Cabinet_No left join PMS_Cabinet_Assembly ass on ass.Cabinet_Assembly_ID = f2.Cabinet_Assembly_ID left join DT_PROJECT project on project.PROJECT_ID = ass.PROJECT_ID where 1=1
and ( f.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f.PlanningWorkOrderNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' or f1.DocumentNum LIKE '%'+ #{pd.KEYWORDS}+'%' )
) gy where 1=1
and ( FIsState = #{pd.KEYWORDS1} )
and ( FState = #{pd.FState} )
and FIsYL='是' [fhstart] order by FInTime desc [fhend]
